Tests on `{cwu,ppt}.master`. Requires `kc,lut`.
Where `x` and `y` are the master table of daily zone sums, 
prior or after removal of non-modeled categories

These are misc snippets that I used for sanity checking. 
They could be turned into full-fledged unit tests someday.

```{r}
unique(x$crop)
unique(x$county)
length(unique(x$crop)) * length(unique(x$county))
length(unique(x$crop)) * length(unique(x$county)) * 365
table(y$county)
table(y$crop)
table(y$county)/365
table(y$crop)/365
max(table(y$county)/365)
max(table(y$crop)/365)
```
